snippet: Another way of looking at the Producers Guild nominations suggests that they don't always work as a predictor of the best picture Oscar.
abstract: Another way of looking at the Producers Guild nominations suggests that they don't always work as a predictor of the best picture Oscar.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES -- On close inspection the nominations for annual movie awards from the Producers Guild of America do less to clarify a confusing Oscars race than it might appear.

headline.main: Where the Producers Guild and the Academy Part Ways
